title: Shield Dwarf
content:
aces. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Shield dwarves survived a long fall from grace, surrendering many of their ancient kingdoms in wars with goblins and orcs. These loss
